topics.title: Daily weird money: AI-powered niche newsletter that actually converts
topics.lede: A newsletter can be an ATM if it’s narrowly scoped, consistently delivered, and tied to one simple offer.
topics.whatsHappening: Creators use AI to summarize a niche daily (local sports, classroom resources, industry intel), then monetize with sponsors, affiliate tools, or a paid tier.
steps: Pick a niche with recurring news (daily/weekly).
Build a repeatable format (3 headlines + 1 take + 1 tool).
Use AI to draft summaries; you add the point of view.
Monetize with one offer (sponsor slot or affiliate).
